page.title: 14RELIGION
page.content: There are 5 churches in the area. Once monthly four of the Protestant churches meet for a United Service. {Methodist Church:}The present church is the third to be built in the area, the other two being no longer used as churches. The minister resides in Brough. {Church of England:}The churches in Elloughton and Brough have a vicar residing at Elloughton, assisted by a full_time Deaconess. Welton Church has its own vicar residing in Welton. {United Reform:}is a combined Congregational and Presbyterian Church with a minister belonging to the Haltemprice area. {Catholic:}Though the nearest church and Catholic Father are at Hessle, 150 members meet every Sunday at Brough Village Hall for a service.
